content: there ain t no laws when you re drinking the claw but if you hate condensation give your can a koozie that ll display your favorite flavor and keep your drink from dripping all over the place made with cotton yarn these minimalist claw can-inspired koozies soak up condensation while looking adorable you can adjust the pattern however you want to make the stripes wider or thinner or make the koozie taller or shorter i used both lily s sugar n cream and peaches n creme to make mine and was able to make 2 koozies with one skein of white with leftovers and obviously far less of the contrast color you can use acrylic yarn too but it won t absorb condensation quite as well **feel free to sell these but credit me/my pattern if you do and tag me on instagram @cutecraftycozy 1 if you post photos i d love to see yours ** 1 https //www instagram com/cutecraftycozy/
